summary: "Grease" is a popular 1978 musical movie about Danny, a greaser, and Sandy, a new student, who fall in love during summer. The film is based on a stage musical and stars John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John. It was a big hit, making lots of money and getting good reviews. Its songs were also very successful. The movie is now considered historically important and has been preserved in the US National Film Registry. There's even a sequel and a prequel in the works.
title: Grease (film)
